summary: This is random but I was just watching that Jake Gyllenhaal Calvin Klein commercial and while I loved Jake in it I would have...
question: This is random but I was just watching that Jake Gyllenhaal Calvin Klein commercial and while I loved Jake in it I would have loooooooooooooved if Chris was in it instead.
answer:
Is that the commercial where the kid was biracial? I love that commercial

Chris would be fantastic in that commercial! I hope we see sumn like it in the future!

Ko-fi

title: Irrelevant
body:
Chris is over being questioned about your age.

Request: hey do you write for chris evans? if so could you do an imagine whre the reader is dating chris but theres a big age gap (you don’t have to specify the age) and its often questioned about it and the relationship but he talks about it during an interview and its kinda angsty but end with fluff?

A/n: Fucking Chris Evans. A man I can definitely write for. Thank you for this request❤️

“When are you done with the show?” You asked Chris, sitting on the counter, as he finished getting ready to leave. He was scheduled to appear on Stephen Colbert to promote Endgame.

“I’m think sometime around 5? Maybe 6?” He answered you, shoving his phone and wallet into his pocket before moving toward you. “Do you want meet somewhere for dinner afterwards?” He placed a hand on your thigh, watching you as your face scrunched up.

“What about take out?” You suggested. “My stomach’s been cramping, and I just don’t feel like going out.”

“Yeah, that’s fine. Just text me whatever you decide that you want, and I’ll pick it up. I’ll be back soon,” he said, kissing you goodbye.

“Have fun.” You watched as he walked out the door, grabbing your phone as you pondered what you wanted for dinner.

…

You were sitting on the couch when you heard the door open and slam shut. You turned around to see Chris carrying a bag of food, suspiciously quiet.

“What happened?” You stood up and moved to where Chris stood. You could see him roll his eyes, thinking about why he was mad to begin with.

“I agree to do these shows to talk about the film. I don’t mind talking about my family, I don’t mind giving stories about my life, but why the hell do they always have to question how old you are,” he began to rant. “It’s never, ‘Chris, how is y/n? Are you and y/n happy?’ No, it’s always ‘why are you dating y/n when she’s so many years younger than you?” As if that matters.”

“It’s fine, Chris,” you told him, not wanting him to really get worked up over this. “I’d rather they talk about my age than anything else, honestly. Some people can be ruthless.”

“But why should they talk about you at all if it’s just going to be something rude? That’s like if someone were to ask me to explain why Scott’s gay, it’s wrong and you gain nothing from knowing.”

“But it’s not the same,” you told him.

“How? Please enlighten me,” Chris asked, the annoyance obvious in his voice.

“Scott isn’t dating you. Everyone will always treat me different because I’m dating Chris Evans- Captain America. Just about any woman in the world wants to be with you, but I’m with you. So they will do everything in their power to pick apart our relationship to make it seem wrong so they feel better about themselves. I will never be good enough for you because I’m not them,” you explained. “I don’t let it get to me because I know you. I know us, and I know that’s what’s more important.”

You could see the emotions in Chris’s eyes begin to calm as he took in your words. “Aren’t you the one that should be telling me stuff like this, gramps?” You joked.

“Well obviously older doesn’t always mean wiser,” he said, moving to pull you into him. You rest your chin against his chest as you looked up at him, a smile on your face.

“Nah, girls are just wiser than men,” you said, biting down on your lip.

“Can’t argue with that one,” he replied with a chuckle before leaning down to kiss you. “But you’re right. I’ll try to hold my temper next time, be a perfect gentleman.”

“Good,” you said as you kissed him once more before pulling away from him and turning toward the bag of food. “Now please tell me what I have to eat.”

…

A few weeks later, Chris’s episode of Stephen Colbert was being aired. You sat down on the couch, ready to watch and see the question that got Chris all worked up.

“Thank you for being with us tonight,” Stephen said.

“Thank you for having me,” Chris replied as he sat in the chair, unbuttoning his coat.

“So, Avengers Endgame,” Stephen began to say. “Can you tell me anything?”

“Not at all,” Chris said, making the crowd laugh. “We can talk about the suits though. Mine has gotten remarkably more comfortable than the first few.”

“That’s what I hear from a lot of the superhero actors. Why can’t any of you have comfortable suits?”

“I don’t know, man, but we should definitely invest in that.”

“So we wanted to know, you’re not single, are you?”

“I’m not,” Chris answered simply.

“Can you tell us about her?” Stephen asked as a picture of the two of you popped up.

“Her name is y/n- there she is, gorgeous as ever. She’s such an kind person. I’m so happy to be with her.”

“We were trying to find some information about her before you came, and we found that she’s actually significantly younger than you. Why are you okay being with someone that inexperienced?” Stephen asked him, not seeing the wrong in his question.

You had to admit, you thought Chris was overreacting a bit to being asked about your age, but he really did ask in an upsetting way. Chris tried to hold his demeanor, but you knew he was upset with the question as soon as it came out of his mouth.

“Because she’s the most amazing woman I’ve ever met. She doesn’t care what others think about her, but I do. And I’d appreciate if you didn’t disrespect her like you just did.” You had a smile on your face as you watched him respond. He defended you while also staying calm and professional, and that’s all you could ask of him. You really did appreciate that he cared about instances like this because it showed how he cared about you.

You turned off the tv and moved to your bedroom where Chris has already retired for the night. You crawled into your side of the bed, cuddling into him.

“I love you,” you whispered, placing a kiss to his skin.

“I love you more,” he said back causing a big smile to creep onto your face.

Chris is over being questioned about your age.

Request: hey do you write for chris evans? if so could you do an imagine whre the reader is dating chris but theres a big age gap (you don’t have to specify the age) and its often questioned about it and the relationship but he talks about it during an interview and its kinda angsty but end with fluff?

A/n: Fucking Chris Evans. A man I can definitely write for. Thank you for this request❤️

A/n: Fucking Chris Evans. A man I can definitely write for. Thank you for this request❤️

“When are you done with the show?” You asked Chris, sitting on the counter, as he finished getting ready to leave. He was scheduled to appear on Stephen Colbert to promote Endgame.

“I’m think sometime around 5? Maybe 6?” He answered you, shoving his phone and wallet into his pocket before moving toward you. “Do you want meet somewhere for dinner afterwards?” He placed a hand on your thigh, watching you as your face scrunched up.

“What about take out?” You suggested. “My stomach’s been cramping, and I just don’t feel like going out.”

“Yeah, that’s fine. Just text me whatever you decide that you want, and I’ll pick it up. I’ll be back soon,” he said, kissing you goodbye.

“Have fun.” You watched as he walked out the door, grabbing your phone as you pondered what you wanted for dinner.

…

You were sitting on the couch when you heard the door open and slam shut. You turned around to see Chris carrying a bag of food, suspiciously quiet.

“What happened?” You stood up and moved to where Chris stood. You could see him roll his eyes, thinking about why he was mad to begin with.

“I agree to do these shows to talk about the film. I don’t mind talking about my family, I don’t mind giving stories about my life, but why the hell do they always have to question how old you are,” he began to rant. “It’s never, ‘Chris, how is y/n? Are you and y/n happy?’ No, it’s always ‘why are you dating y/n when she’s so many years younger than you?” As if that matters.”

“It’s fine, Chris,” you told him, not wanting him to really get worked up over this. “I’d rather they talk about my age than anything else, honestly. Some people can be ruthless.”

“But why should they talk about you at all if it’s just going to be something rude? That’s like if someone were to ask me to explain why Scott’s gay, it’s wrong and you gain nothing from knowing.”

“But it’s not the same,” you told him.

“How? Please enlighten me,” Chris asked, the annoyance obvious in his voice.

“Scott isn’t dating you. Everyone will always treat me different because I’m dating Chris Evans- Captain America. Just about any woman in the world wants to be with you, but I’m with you. So they will do everything in their power to pick apart our relationship to make it seem wrong so they feel better about themselves. I will never be good enough for you because I’m not them,” you explained. “I don’t let it get to me because I know you. I know us, and I know that’s what’s more important.”

You could see the emotions in Chris’s eyes begin to calm as he took in your words. “Aren’t you the one that should be telling me stuff like this, gramps?” You joked.

“Well obviously older doesn’t always mean wiser,” he said, moving to pull you into him. You rest your chin against his chest as you looked up at him, a smile on your face.

“Nah, girls are just wiser than men,” you said, biting down on your lip.

“Can’t argue with that one,” he replied with a chuckle before leaning down to kiss you. “But you’re right. I’ll try to hold my temper next time, be a perfect gentleman.”

“Good,” you said as you kissed him once more before pulling away from him and turning toward the bag of food. “Now please tell me what I have to eat.”

…

A few weeks later, Chris’s episode of Stephen Colbert was being aired. You sat down on the couch, ready to watch and see the question that got Chris all worked up.

“Thank you for being with us tonight,” Stephen said.

“Thank you for having me,” Chris replied as he sat in the chair, unbuttoning his coat.

“So, Avengers Endgame,” Stephen began to say. “Can you tell me anything?”

“Not at all,” Chris said, making the crowd laugh. “We can talk about the suits though. Mine has gotten remarkably more comfortable than the first few.”

“That’s what I hear from a lot of the superhero actors. Why can’t any of you have comfortable suits?”

“I don’t know, man, but we should definitely invest in that.”

“So we wanted to know, you’re not single, are you?”

“I’m not,” Chris answered simply.

“Can you tell us about her?” Stephen asked as a picture of the two of you popped up.

“Her name is y/n- there she is, gorgeous as ever. She’s such an kind person. I’m so happy to be with her.”

“We were trying to find some information about her before you came, and we found that she’s actually significantly younger than you. Why are you okay being with someone that inexperienced?” Stephen asked him, not seeing the wrong in his question.

You had to admit, you thought Chris was overreacting a bit to being asked about your age, but he really did ask in an upsetting way. Chris tried to hold his demeanor, but you knew he was upset with the question as soon as it came out of his mouth.

“Because she’s the most amazing woman I’ve ever met. She doesn’t care what others think about her, but I do. And I’d appreciate if you didn’t disrespect her like you just did.” You had a smile on your face as you watched him respond. He defended you while also staying calm and professional, and that’s all you could ask of him. You really did appreciate that he cared about instances like this because it showed how he cared about you.

You turned off the tv and moved to your bedroom where Chris has already retired for the night. You crawled into your side of the bed, cuddling into him.

“I love you,” you whispered, placing a kiss to his skin.

“I love you more,” he said back causing a big smile to creep onto your face.

You could see the emotions in Chris’s eyes begin to calm as he took in your words. “Aren’t you the one that should be telling me stuff like this, gramps?” You joked.

“Well obviously older doesn’t always mean wiser,” he said, moving to pull you into him. You rest your chin against his chest as you looked up at him, a smile on your face.

“Nah, girls are just wiser than men,” you said, biting down on your lip.

“Can’t argue with that one,” he replied with a chuckle before leaning down to kiss you. “But you’re right. I’ll try to hold my temper next time, be a perfect gentleman.”

“Good,” you said as you kissed him once more before pulling away from him and turning toward the bag of food. “Now please tell me what I have to eat.”

…

“Not at all,” Chris said, making the crowd laugh. “We can talk about the suits though. Mine has gotten remarkably more comfortable than the first few.”

“I don’t know, man, but we should definitely invest in that.”

“So we wanted to know, you’re not single, are you?”

“I’m not,” Chris answered simply.

“Can you tell us about her?” Stephen asked as a picture of the two of you popped up.

“Her name is y/n- there she is, gorgeous as ever. She’s such an kind person. I’m so happy to be with her.”

“We were trying to find some information about her before you came, and we found that she’s actually significantly younger than you. Why are you okay being with someone that inexperienced?” Stephen asked him, not seeing the wrong in his question.

You had to admit, you thought Chris was overreacting a bit to being asked about your age, but he really did ask in an upsetting way. Chris tried to hold his demeanor, but you knew he was upset with the question as soon as it came out of his mouth.

“Because she’s the most amazing woman I’ve ever met. She doesn’t care what others think about her, but I do. And I’d appreciate if you didn’t disrespect her like you just did.” You had a smile on your face as you watched him respond. He defended you while also staying calm and professional, and that’s all you could ask of him. You really did appreciate that he cared about instances like this because it showed how he cared about you.

You turned off the tv and moved to your bedroom where Chris has already retired for the night. You crawled into your side of the bed, cuddling into him.

“I love you,” you whispered, placing a kiss to his skin.

“I love you more,” he said back causing a big smile to creep onto your face.

blog.name: seqveydaniel
blog.title: save your tears for beauty
blog.description: esme nova | 17 | daniel seavey | kian and jc | d.j.s. imagines & thoughts

title: dad!chris evans headcanon
body:
idk man, i’m just a sucker for him

  • before we get into it, let’s review the pregnancy
  • he was beyond excited and happy when you told him
  • he was fucking ecstatic
  • he wanted a daughter so badly
  • just a little girl to have, that way he could teach her how to fight and how to cook pesto eggs
  • he wanted to take her to meet all of his friends and family
  • but he was perfectly fine with a son
  • he hated seeing you give birth
  • i mean this man was in t.e.a.r.s while you were pushing a human out
  • finally
  • meet your little boy, leo james evans
  • you literally woke up in the hospital to chris sitting near the window with your newborn son in his arms
  • and he’s whispering these cute lil things to him
  • and that’s enough to make you cry

timeskip

  • chris is definitely a stay-at-home dad
  • he took leo to meet the mcu cast as soon as possible
  • uncle downey is the only one who’s allowed to hold him
  • the rest cannot be trusted
  • well that’s not true, hemsworth would be so soft with leo
  • i mean imagine thor holding your son
  • his first word would be “thor”
  • chris (h) would practically die
  • let’s say that one day, leo finds your piano
  • while you and chris passed out mid-day
  • and he starts banging on the keys
  • all chris has to say is “he’s gonna be a superstar”
  • he spoils this boy
  • every time leo says a word, he buys him a new toy
  • WAIT
  • I FORGOT

dodger

  • because he deserves his own lil part
  • dodger is so fucking protective of you while you’re pregnant
  • every time chris goes to like lay his hand on your stomach or some shit, he be barking at him like he’s gonna fucking stab you
  • when your water breaks after your all dry from coming out of the shower, he’s the first the notify chris
  • and when you come home with little leo in your arms, the first thing dodger does is give him a lil kiss
  • which you have to yell at him for, cause, ya know…diseases
  • he’s always sleeps next to leo’s crib
  • you walked into the living room once to find chris asleep on the couch with leo in his left arm on his chest and dodger on the other side
  • and his paw is reaching out to leo

k i’m done

  • dodger is so fucking protective of you while you’re pregnant
  • every time chris goes to like lay his hand on your stomach or some shit, he be barking at him like he’s gonna fucking stab you
  • when your water breaks after your all dry from coming out of the shower, he’s the first the notify chris
  • and when you come home with little leo in your arms, the first thing dodger does is give him a lil kiss
  • which you have to yell at him for, cause, ya know…diseases
  • he’s always sleeps next to leo’s crib
  • you walked into the living room once to find chris asleep on the couch with leo in his left arm on his chest and dodger on the other side
  • and his paw is reaching out to leo

k i’m done

trail.content_raw:
idk man, i’m just a sucker for him

  • before we get into it, let’s review the pregnancy
  • he was beyond excited and happy when you told him
  • he was fucking ecstatic
  • he wanted a daughter so badly
  • just a little girl to have, that way he could teach her how to fight and how to cook pesto eggs
  • he wanted to take her to meet all of his friends and family
  • but he was perfectly fine with a son
  • he hated seeing you give birth
  • i mean this man was in t.e.a.r.s while you were pushing a human out
  • finally
  • meet your little boy, leo james evans
  • you literally woke up in the hospital to chris sitting near the window with your newborn son in his arms
  • and he’s whispering these cute lil things to him
  • and that’s enough to make you cry

timeskip

  • chris is definitely a stay-at-home dad
  • he took leo to meet the mcu cast as soon as possible
  • uncle downey is the only one who’s allowed to hold him
  • the rest cannot be trusted
  • well that’s not true, hemsworth would be so soft with leo
  • i mean imagine thor holding your son
  • his first word would be “thor”
  • chris (h) would practically die
  • let’s say that one day, leo finds your piano
  • while you and chris passed out mid-day
  • and he starts banging on the keys
  • all chris has to say is “he’s gonna be a superstar”
  • he spoils this boy
  • every time leo says a word, he buys him a new toy
  • WAIT
  • I FORGOT

dodger

  • because he deserves his own lil part
  • dodger is so fucking protective of you while you’re pregnant
  • every time chris goes to like lay his hand on your stomach or some shit, he be barking at him like he’s gonna fucking stab you

  • and when you come home with little leo in your arms, the first thing dodger does is give him a lil kiss

  • you walked into the living room once to find chris asleep on the couch with leo in his left arm on his chest and dodger on the other side
  • and his paw is reaching out to leo

summary: My friend just asked me if I am sane
body:
My friend just asked me if I am sane

Of course, I am

I just told her that I watched Chris Evans movies till the sun came up and live chatted it in our discord server so she can see what I’m up to

summary: Steve saying Avengers ᴬˢˢᴱᵐᴮᴸᵉ and no one running until Thor starts screaming and charging because Steve is a fucking idiot and...
body: Steve saying Avengers ᴬˢˢᴱᵐᴮᴸᵉ and no one running until Thor starts screaming and charging because Steve is a fucking idiot and WHISPERED Assemble acting like everyone is gonna hear him. Bucky was right in saying he’s taking all the stupid with him, he’s always been a little dumb nut. I love that old man so much.

summary: I honestly wouldn’t care if he dated someone younger than him as long as he didn’t know her while she was a little girl, and...
question: I honestly wouldn’t care if he dated someone younger than him as long as he didn’t know her while she was a little girl, and it's legal and there's consent on both sides. I just want him to be happy tbh
answer:
I want him to be happy too 😭

I honestly hope he’s happy without being in a relationship though lmao most importantly
